entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI Omnibus 2000/7. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population.
entry.dcterms:creator: Zsadányi-Nagy, Csaba
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-E26: TÁRKI Omnibus 2000/7. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population.. data sheet. Version: 2009-04-09
entry.dcterms:creator: 1. Gazsó, Tibor
2. Sik, Endre
3. Tóth, Zsolt
4. Gál, Róbert Iván
5. Holmes, Leslie
entry.dcterms:contributor: United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees Representative Office in Hungary (2.)
University of Melbourne Department of Political Science (5.)
entry.dcterms:description: 1. party preferences, evaluation of politicians, evaluation of the work of the government and opposition, political and social self-categorization 2. opinion about the internal customs immunity and the refugee issue 3. opinions about the changes in gas and medicine prices, evaluation of price level 4. knowledge about pension funds, opinion about the reform of the retirement law 5. evaluation of corruption and bribery
entry.dcterms:subject: labour and employment
mass political behavior, attitudes
international politics and organisations
social behaviour and attitudes
political institutions, public administration
social welfare policy and systems
business/industrial management and organisation
consumption/consumer behavior
economic conditions and indicators
health care and medical treatment
transport, travel (and mobility)
migration
demography
person
survey data
cross-section

A multi-stage proportionally stratified random probability sample representative of the Hungarian adult population. Unsuccessful inquiries were substituted with supplementary addresses, where persons to be interviewed were selected on the basis of the Leslie Kish key.
face-to-face interview
A
entry.dcterms:rights: Publications based on TÁRKI data collections should acknowledge those sources, primary investigators and depositors.
